fdroid_repo.purpose: Primary F-Droid repository with APK files and metadata
components: fdroid/repo/ - Contains APK files and F-Droid metadata
apps.yaml - App definitions with icon URLs and settings

pip_cache_repo.purpose: External repository for caching pip dependencies
components: requirements.txt - List of dependencies to cache
wheels/ - Cached wheel files for faster installation
Cached Python packages to speed up CI workflows
Maintained separately to optimize workflow execution
Other static assets for user information
github_pages.independence: Does not affect F-Droid repository functionality

workflow_optimization.current_approach: Use external pip cache repository with fallback
implementation: Use requirements.txt from cache repo for pip caching
Try to install from cached wheels first, fallback to PyPI if needed

separation_principles.fdroid_functionality: APK files and metadata in fdroid/repo directory
separation_principles.website_functionality: Static HTML/CSS/JS files served via GitHub Pages
separation_principles.independence: Changes to website do not affect F-Droid repository access

access_paths.fdroid_clients: /repo - Direct access to F-Droid repository files

integration_method: Try installing from pip-cache/wheels first, then fallback to PyPI
